SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.LOG_USE_ID , A.LOG_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LOG_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LOG_TIME /* 로그 일시 */ , A.LOG_IP , A.LOG_URL , NVL(B.USR_NM,'-') USR_NM , B.USR_IMG_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 WHERE MST_CD = 'ADM00003' AND SUB_CD = A.MENU_CD AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#) AS LOG_TYPE FROM ( SELECT * FROM STM5100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT USR_ID, USR_NM, USR_IMG_ID FROM STM3000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) B ON ( A.LOG_USR_ID = B.USR_ID) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.LOG_TIME DESC
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MENU_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.LOG_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.LOG_IP LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.MENU_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.LOG_URL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.MENU_URL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# || '%'
AND T1.LOG_TIME >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.LOG_TIME <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
